message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product for $900,000. It's a steal at this price, considering its value to you.  Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  While I can't meet your exact price, I'm willing to come down to $750,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's work together to make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. Can you do $725,000?
